successes.title: NFC Ring - One Smart Ring, Unlimited Possibilities
successes.description: The NFC Ring can be used to unlock doors, mobile phones and to transfer information and link people.

Pledges.description: Show some love!  Help us fund our community projects and promote the open source aspect of the NFC Ring project
Be your own boss.  3D print your own ring!  We will ship you an NFC inlay.

NFC Ring with Limited Edition Kickstarter Community Designed Covers & App.
*Competition will be run during Kickstart so get your design ideas in early!
ALPHA MAN SIZE RING: This ring is for big bleefy chaps that have huge grizzly bear throttling hands.  The ring is 12mm wide.  This Ring also works with the Galaxy S4 and the BlackBerry Z10.
For the Mrs!  NFC Ring & App for US Ring Size 4-5.5

1 x NFC Ring
1 x ALPHA MAN SIZE RING
Due to popular demand here is a His & Hers Pledge :) 2x Normal NFC Rings, with small sizes (4-5.5) as well!
2 x ALPHA MAN SIZE RING:  This ring is for big bleefy chaps that have huge grizzly bear throttling hands. The ring is 12mm wide. This Ring also works with the Galaxy S4 and the BlackBerry Z10.

Due to popular demand we're adding The Collection early! This includes a Normal NFC Ring, Alpha Ring and the option of a Stealth Bomber Edition Ring. You will also get 3 inlays, 1 16ml, 120ml, 1 30ml. These all come with a presentation box and a chain to keep those extra rings on!
NFC Ring with Custom (Designed by you!) Top Cover, an Original Ring Prototype, App and Fancy Ring Box.
NFC Ring with Custom (Designed by you!) Covers, App all wrapped up in a Fancy Ring Box
NFC Ring with Custom (Designed by you!) Covers, an Original Ring Prototype, App and a Silver signature slick Ring Box.
NFC Ring with Custom (Designed by you!) Covers,  Custom message engraved on inner of ring, App and all wrapped up in Silver signature slick Ring Box
